name: Promise - Back to School - Demo
description:
Promise is the name of the private school you've applied for a teaching job to. However, it turned out to be far worse than just just working overtime and dealing with troublesome students. The Headmistress, Beatrice, is actually a demon summoner, using the knowledge of demons to mold and brainwash the students into mindless slaves for various purposes. On the first day of your new job, you're trapped in another dimension made by these fiends. 

You can choose to play either a magic build or physical build as your main character, both come with unique skills to use.
